bike.description: Specialized E5 AEROTEC, fully manipulated tubing, compact race geometry, FACT carbon seatstays with Zertz inserts

Specialized Pro lightweight handlebar, all aluminum, racing drop, 31.8 clamp

Shimano Ultegra, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra, triple crankset, Hollowtech II 2-piece design
Shimano R600, sleeve-joint and machined aluminum rim, anodized
Shimano R600, 20 hole, aluminum freehub body, Shimano QR
